title: GCF of Terms
text: Find the greatest common factor of all the terms of the polynomial.

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Multiply the terms shared by both expressions.\n$$GCF=2\times2\times3$$\n$$GCF=12$$

title: Write each Term as a Product using GCF
text: Rewrite $$12x$$ and $$60$$ as products of their GCF, $$12$$.\n$$12x-60$$\n$$12x-12\times5$$

title: Reverse Distributive Property
text: Use the reverse Distributive Property to factor the expression.\n$$12\left(x-5\right)$$
